title: Winter crumble tart
description: The delicious dessert is the perfect combination of tart and crumble filled to the brim with juicy apples and blackberries. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 28cm/11in round, loose-bottomed, fluted tart tin, about 3-4cm (1¼–1½in) deep, and some baking beans.
ingredients: 225g/8oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
4 large Bramley apples (about 1.2kg/2lb 10oz), peeled, cored and cut into small chunks
100g/3½oz butter, at room temperature, cut into cubes
custard or double cream, to serve
